delivery.title: Delivery and Self-Pickup Options
delivery.subtitle: We offer convenient delivery and self-pickup options for your orders. Choose what works best for you.
delivery.orderConfirmationDescription: Your order is confirmed after payment or WhatsApp confirmation. Once confirmed, we start preparing your order which typically takes 3 days (72 hours). We will contact you to confirm the exact pickup or delivery time.
delivery.paymentMethodsDescription: For self-pickup with cash payment, you settle the amount on-site. For online payments, your order is secured immediately. Delivery costs are added to your order total.
delivery.contactSupportDescription: For any questions regarding delivery or pickup, please contact us via WhatsApp. We are here to help and will respond promptly.

header.subtitle: Terms and Conditions
header.title: General Terms and Conditions (AGB)
header.description: Valid for all distance contracts of {companyName} as of 1 November 2025. These conditions complement mandatory consumer rights and do not limit statutory protections under Austrian law.

clause1.title: 1. Scope
clause1.body: These Terms and Conditions govern all orders placed via the online shop of {companyName}. They are based on the Austrian Consumer Protection Act (KSchG), the E-Commerce Act (ECG) and the Austrian Civil Code (ABGB).

clause2.title: 2. Contract language and conclusion
clause2.body: The contract languages are German, Russian and English. Products presented in the shop are non-binding invitations to order. A contract is formed when we confirm your order in writing (e-mail) or dispatch the goods.

clause3.title: 3. Prices and payment
clause3.body: All prices are stated in euros and include statutory Austrian VAT. Payment can be made either via full online payment (Stripe) or cash upon pickup. Part-payment or deposit models are not offered. Online payments are processed immediately, ensuring reservation of the selected bouquet or arrangement.

clause4.title: 4. Delivery and pickup
clause4.body: We currently deliver within Styria, Austria, according to the times listed on the Delivery page. Pickup is available at the showroom in Knittelfeld around the clock by appointment. Risk passes to the customer once the goods are handed over to the customer or their authorised representative.

clause5.title: 5. Retention of title
clause5.body: Goods remain the property of Ballon Boutique until full payment has been received.

clause6.title: 6. Right of withdrawal
clause6.body: Consumers have a right to withdraw within 14 days as described in our Cancellation and Refund Policy. Due to the personalised nature of balloon arrangements, customised orders may be excluded pursuant to Section 18 paragraph 1 lit. c FAGG.

clause7.title: 7. Warranty and defects
clause7.body: The statutory warranty period of two years applies. Please notify us of any defects without undue delay. For natural latex products, minor colour deviations or changes in volume caused by ambient temperature do not constitute defects.

clause8.title: 8. Liability
clause8.body: We are liable for intent and gross negligence in accordance with Austrian law. Liability for slightly negligent damage, consequential damage and loss of profit is excluded, unless mandatory consumer protection provisions provide otherwise.

clause9.title: 9. Force majeure
clause9.body: Events outside our control (e.g. strikes, power outages, extreme weather) may delay delivery. We will inform you immediately and propose alternative dates or a refund.

clause10.title: 10. Dispute resolution
clause10.body: The competent court for disputes with consumers is determined by Section 14 KSchG. Austrian law applies under exclusion of the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods. Consumers can submit complaints via the EU platform for online dispute resolution.
